Text:
Nice you give us both the ISO and the MDS files. More should do so.
Do you have big scans of the disk and cover too?

Thanks for the feedback! I'm a beginner in these things so it's good to know that the MDS file is of significance to some, will include it in later releases. What happens without it when burning? Unfortunately, I don't have a scanner so no images now.
Täältä kiittää elokuvasta. Itse AVItin sen arkistooni.
